column2: ENGLISH
I was playing when suddently my head started to hurt, everything aroung me started to look blury and there was strange swirly colors all around me.
Arrrg...
I have noticed that sometimes strange things happens around me - objects move by themselves, some kind of swirling light engulfs me for a moment, but strangely nobody else has noticed it.
I should talk to [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] about it.
I have noticed that one of the children in [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] court is a bit strange, it seems to  me that he has a talent for magic.
I should examine the child closer and bring this to [Root.Liege.GetTitle]s attenion.
Court magician [From.GetFirstName] has been paying lots of attention to me lately. Today [From.GetSheHe] told me the reason - it seems I have a talent for magic.
Oh!
I have noticed that one of the children in my court is a bit strange, it seems to me that he has a talent for magic.
I should examine the child closer.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] has been paying lots of attention to me lately. Today [From.GetSheHe] told me the reason - it seems I have a talent for magic, same as [From.GetHerHim].
Oh!
So it turns out my [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] have a magic talent. What should I do with [From.GetHerHim]?
I could make [From.GetHerHim] to learn to control [From.GetHerHis] talents.
See more options
There is nothing I can do.
I will not teach a monster!
Kill the abomination!
So it turns out my [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] have a magic talent. I could make [From.GetHerHim] to learn to control [From.GetHerHis] talents.
Send [From.GetHerHim] to the Ban Ard's Magic Academy.
Send [From.GetHerHim] to the Aretuza Academy.
Send [From.GetHerHim] to the Nilfgaard Magic Academy.
Leave [From.GetFirstName] in court magician's care.
I will find someone suitable to take care of [From.GetFirstName]
Seems like I will need to teach [From.GetHerHim] myself.
I should consider other options.
After years of studying I have become a sorcerer.
Ok

[Root.GetTitledName],
your [GetFromFromRelation] [FromFrom.GetFirstName] have displayed a magic talent, and after some consideratons I have decided to send the child to Ban Ard academy where [FromFrom.GetSheHe] will be able to learn to control [FromFrom.GetHerHis] talents!

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]

Signed,

knowing that you have experience with matters of magic, I wish to entrust my [GetFromRelation] [FromFrom.GetFirstName] to your care!

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
Very well.
I refuse.

[Root.GetTitledName],
your [GetFromFromRelation] [FromFrom.GetFirstName] have displayed a magic talent, and after some consideratons I have decided to entrust the child to someone experienced with such matters - a sorcerer. Hopefully [FromFrom.GetFirstName] will be able to learn to control [FromFrom.GetHerHis] talents!

Signed,

Ok

your [GetFromFromRelation] [FromFrom.GetFirstName] have displayed a magic talent, and after some consideratons I have decided that I can no longer serve as the childs guardian!

Ok

Ok

Your [GetFromRelation], [From.GetTitledFirstName], has revealed you that [From.GetSheHe] has a knack for magic and wishes to learn to control [From.GetHerHis] talent properly. As such, [From.GetSheHe] asks you permission to leave to do so.
I will not allow it!
Very weel, you have my permission.
After serching for a sorcerer to serve you and advise on matters of magic, you have found a suitable candidate from...
Areztua Academy.
Ban Ard Academy.

seeing as you have no need for my talens I have decided to return to[From.Liege.PrimaryTitle.GetName].
